page.title: 13PROBLEMS OF RECREATION
page.content: Despite the various recreational activities on offer and others like walking,fishing in the Lune and golf on the small golf course,local residents feel that the leisure facilities are inadequate.With a large percentage of older people,demand for energetic pursuits is not great,and it is often difficult to persuade sufficient people to arrange them.Many young people feel that there is very little for them to do in the evening, except occasionally visit the{Youth {Club}at{Centre Five}in Horsemarket. Fortunately,unemployment is not high and so there are few with little to do during the day.Some residents believe that more{leisure facilities}should be created,such as a swimming pool or leisure complex,but the cost would be high.Others think that school facilities should be used more.
